values.name: Night
values.description: What night the player is currently on.

values.name: Star 1
values.description: The first star, obtained for beating Night 5.

values.name: Star 2
values.description: The second star, obtained for beating Night 6.

values.name: Star 3
values.description: The third star, obtained for beating Nightmare.

values.name: Star 4
values.description: The fourth star, obtained for beating 20/20/20/20.

values.name: Mini-Star 1
values.description: The first mini-star, obtained for beating Nightmare with Blind Mode enabled.

values.name: Mini-Star 2
values.description: The second mini-star, obtained for beating Nightmare with Mad Freddy enabled.

values.name: Mini-Star 3
values.description: The third mini-star, obtained for beating Nightmare with Insta-Foxy enabled.

values.name: Mini-Star 4
values.description: The fourth mini-star, obtained for beating Nightmare with Blind Mode, Mad Freddy, and Insta-Foxy enabled.

values.name: Mini-Star 5
values.description: The fifth mini-star, obtained for beating Nightmare with All Nightmare enabled.

values.name: Mini-Star 6
values.description: The sixth mini-star, obtained for beating Nightmare with Blind Mode and All Nightmare enabled.

values.name: Cutscene ID
values.description: What cutscene the player is currently on.

values.name: Show Audio Tip
values.description: Whether or not to show the 'Adjust Audio' menu on start.
